div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1275 Dali (anc. Idalium), 1869 (297, part) Burial: c. 425-400 B.C. (Price) Contents: 123+ AR. From excavations Athens: 7 tetradr. Citium: 26 st.; 15 fr. ANS 1944.100.57999 Idalium: 20 st.; 10 fr. ANS 1944.100.58000 ANS 1944.100.57999 Lapethus: 6 st. Paphus: 11 st.; 1 fr. Salamis: 20 st.; 1 fr. Unc. Cypriote mints: 6 st. Disposition: London 119; New York 3 (Citium 1, Idalium 2) Lang, NC 1871, pp. 1-18 Six, RN 1883, pp. 257 f. BMCCyprus, passim Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 8, no. 5 Price, NC 1969, pp. 1-2
